## IService.Ping() method

Pings the service endpoint to detect connectivity status.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
Ping(): Promise<boolean>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<boolean>`

`true` on success, `false` on failure. The promise is never rejected.
